title: It took over 3000 games..
body:
But I finally, On my 1485th win in normals, In team builder.

PLAYED WITH A RIOTER.

Better yet.  They supported me.  And I carried us to victory.  It was like magic.

http://i.imgur.com/47CmTp5.jpg

replies.body: Kinda pointless to even block their names, we can just look you up and see match history.

Well Still!  I wanted to leave it up here as my badge!  I'm still super excited that after this long I finally got to play with someone who helps make the game what it is.  And yaknow, Just privacy things.  Of course you can look me up, But who's going to the trouble!  Haha

That and I don't like the idea of broadcasting my victory as someones loss!
Wait, you don't have to block the names if it's not "shaming", right?

gratz...though there are reds out there that don't have riot in their name.  As a matter of fact when the reds did their match vs doom bots of doom I recognized one of the names that I had played against a number of times, though he was never on my team.
Good job man! It's as rare as unboxing that hat! (Bad joke kill me now)

I think in my lifetime I;ve played with about 12 or so different rioters.

Three were in random games and the rest were part of Riot teams and when the RIoters Vs. 10Winstreak event took place.

I miss 10Winstreak.

If you're not painting someone in a negative light, you don't have to blot out names. Besides, we can just go to your match history and check anyway <3

Congrats, friend.
